an7.68:4.1: “Sattahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti … pe …
an7.68:4.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaññū ca hoti atthaññū ca attaññū ca mattaññū ca kālaññū ca parisaññū ca puggalaparoparaññū ca.
an7.68:5.3: suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthaṃ udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallaṃ.
an7.68:5.4: No ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaṃ jāneyya—
an7.68:5.7: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaṃ jānāti—
an7.68:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tassa tasseva bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānāti:
an7.68:6.3: ‘ayaṃ imassa bhāsitassa attho, ayaṃ imassa bhāsitassa attho’ti.
an7.68:6.4: No ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tassa tasseva bhāsitassa atthaṃ jāneyya:
an7.68:6.5: ‘ayaṃ imassa bhāsitassa attho, ayaṃ imassa bhāsitassa attho’ti, nayidha ‘atthaññū’ti vucceyya.
an7.68:6.6: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tassa tasseva bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānāti:
an7.68:6.7: ‘ayaṃ imassa bhāsitassa attho, ayaṃ imassa bhāsitassa attho’ti, tasmā ‘atthaññū’ti vuccati.
an7.68:7.3: ‘ettakomhi saddhāya sīlena sutena cāgena paññāya paṭibhānenā’ti.
an7.68:7.4: No ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attānaṃ jāneyya:
an7.68:7.5: ‘ettakomhi saddhāya sīlena sutena cāgena paññāya paṭibhānenā’ti, nayidha ‘attaññū’ti vucceyya.
an7.68:7.6: Yasmā ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attānaṃ jānāti:
an7.68:7.7: ‘ettakomhi saddhāya sīlena sutena cāgena paññāya paṭibhānenā’ti, tasmā ‘attaññū’ti vuccati.
an7.68:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mattaṃ jānāti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṃ paṭiggahaṇāya.
an7.68:8.3: No ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mattaṃ jāneyya cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṃ paṭiggahaṇāya, nayidha ‘mattaññū’ti vucceyya.
an7.68:8.4: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mattaṃ jānāti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṃ paṭiggahaṇāya, tasmā ‘mattaññū’ti vuccati.
an7.68:8.5: Iti dhammaññū, atthaññū, attaññū, mattaññū. (4)
an7.68:9.3: ‘ayaṃ kālo uddesassa, ayaṃ kālo paripucchāya, ayaṃ kālo yogassa, ayaṃ kālo paṭisallānassā’ti.
an7.68:9.4: No ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kālaṃ jāneyya:
an7.68:9.5: ‘ayaṃ kālo uddesassa, ayaṃ kālo paripucchāya, ayaṃ kālo yogassa, ayaṃ kālo paṭisallānassā’ti, nayidha ‘kālaññū’ti vucceyya.
an7.68:9.6: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kālaṃ jānāti:
an7.68:9.7: ‘ayaṃ kālo uddesassa, ayaṃ kālo paripucchāya, ayaṃ kālo yogassa, ayaṃ kālo paṭisallānassā’ti, tasmā ‘kālaññū’ti vuccati.
an7.68:9.8: Iti dhammaññū, atthaññū, attaññū, mattaññū, kālaññū. (5)
an7.68:10.3: ‘ayaṃ khattiyaparisā, ayaṃ brāhmaṇaparisā, ayaṃ gahapatiparisā, ayaṃ samaṇaparisā.
an7.68:10.4: Tattha evaṃ upasaṅkamitabbaṃ, evaṃ ṭhātabbaṃ, evaṃ kattabbaṃ, evaṃ nisīditabbaṃ, evaṃ bhāsitabbaṃ, evaṃ tuṇhī bhavitabban’ti.
an7.68:10.5: No ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parisaṃ jāneyya:
an7.68:10.8: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parisaṃ jānāti:
an7.68:10.9: ‘ayaṃ khattiyaparisā, ayaṃ brāhmaṇaparisā, ayaṃ gahapatiparisā, ayaṃ samaṇaparisā.
an7.68:10.10: Tattha evaṃ upasaṅkamitabbaṃ, evaṃ ṭhātabbaṃ, evaṃ kattabbaṃ, evaṃ nisīditabbaṃ, evaṃ bhāsitabbaṃ, evaṃ tuṇhī bhavitabban’ti, tasmā ‘parisaññū’ti vuccati.
an7.68:10.11: Iti dhammaññū, atthaññū, attaññū, mattaññū, kālaññū, parisaññū. (6)
an7.68:11.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno dvayena puggalā viditā honti.
an7.68:11.4: eko ariyānaṃ dassanakāmo, eko ariyānaṃ na dassanakāmo.
an7.68:11.5: Yvāyaṃ puggalo ariyānaṃ na dassanakāmo, evaṃ so tenaṅgena gārayho.
an7.68:11.6: Yvāyaṃ puggalo ariyānaṃ dassanakāmo, evaṃ so tenaṅgena pāsaṃso.
an7.68:12.2: eko saddhammaṃ sotukāmo, eko saddhammaṃ na sotukāmo.
an7.68:12.3: Yvāyaṃ puggalo saddhammaṃ na sotukāmo, evaṃ so tenaṅgena gārayho.
an7.68:12.4: Yvāyaṃ puggalo saddhammaṃ sotukāmo, evaṃ so tenaṅgena pāsaṃso.
an7.68:13.2: eko ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇāti, eko anohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇāti.
an7.68:13.3: Yvāyaṃ puggalo anohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇāti, evaṃ so tenaṅgena gārayho.
an7.68:13.4: Yvāyaṃ puggalo ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇāti, evaṃ so tenaṅgena pāsaṃso.
an7.68:14.1: Dve puggalā ohitasotā dhammaṃ suṇanti—
an7.68:14.2: eko sutvā dhammaṃ dhāreti, eko sutvā dhammaṃ na dhāreti.
an7.68:14.3: Yvāyaṃ puggalo sutvā na dhammaṃ dhāreti, evaṃ so tenaṅgena gārayho.
an7.68:14.4: Yvāyaṃ puggalo sutvā dhammaṃ dhāreti, evaṃ so tenaṅgena pāsaṃso.
an7.68:15.1: Dve puggalā sutvā dhammaṃ dhārenti—
an7.68:15.2: eko dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthaṃ upaparikkhati, eko dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthaṃ na upaparikkhati.
an7.68:15.3: Yvāyaṃ puggalo dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthaṃ na upaparikkhati, evaṃ so tenaṅgena gārayho.
an7.68:15.4: Yvāyaṃ puggalo dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthaṃ upaparikkhati, evaṃ so tenaṅgena pāsaṃso.
an7.68:16.1: Dve puggalā dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthaṃ upaparikkhanti—
an7.68:16.2: eko atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno, eko atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya na dhammānudhammappaṭipanno.
an7.68:16.3: Yvāyaṃ puggalo atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya na dhammānudhammappaṭipanno, evaṃ so tenaṅgena gārayho.
an7.68:16.4: Yvāyaṃ puggalo atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno, evaṃ so tenaṅgena pāsaṃso.
an7.68:17.2: eko attahitāya paṭipanno no parahitāya, eko attahitāya ca paṭipanno parahitāya ca.
an7.68:17.3: Yvāyaṃ puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno no parahitāya, evaṃ so tenaṅgena gārayho.
an7.68:17.4: Yvāyaṃ puggalo attahitāya ca paṭipanno parahitāya ca, evaṃ so tenaṅgena pāsaṃso.
an7.68:18.1: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno dvayena puggalā viditā honti.
an7.68:19.2: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo … pe …
